name: File-Jam
description:
File-Jam is a short, lighthearted puzzle game. Help the intern to combine sound files with their matching video recordings. 

///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

The professor is preparing his bi-centennial lecture about the galactic fauna of the Milky Way but his clumsy intern just messed up big time! All the files got completely mixed up! Help the intern to unjam this chaos by recombining the sound files with the matching video recordings and get the Professor back on track!

///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

How this got made

In September 2022, we embarked on our fourth, annual Ani-Jam, the time of the year where we collaborate on a non-commercial creative project. Once again we spent a long weekend away from our busy office, and stayed in a beautiful cabin in the misty Swiss mountains. This time around, instead of a short film, we got our hands working on an interactive experience. Experimenting with Unity, weird soundbites and quirky creature designs, the result is this hand-drawn mini-game and a Team Tumult first!

For more info, check out https://www.teamtumult.ch/file-jam
